results.title: Simvastatin treatment for inflammatory attacks of the hyperimmunoglobulinemia D and periodic fever syndrome.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment for @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory attacks@@@ of the @DISEASE_Mevalonate_Kinase_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D054078 @@@hyperimmunoglobulinemia D@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Autoinflammatory_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056660 @@@periodic fever syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Simon A, Drewe E, van der Meer JW, Powell RJ, Kelley RI, Stalenhoef AF, Drenth JP. Simvastatin treatment for inflammatory attacks of the hyperimmunoglobulinemia D and periodic fever syndrome. Clin Pharmacol Ther. 2004 May;75(5):476-83. PMID: 15116060
citations.BibTeX: @article{15116060, title={Simvastatin treatment for inflammatory attacks of the hyperimmunoglobulinemia D and periodic fever syndrome.}, author={Simon A and Drewe E and van der Meer JW and Powell RJ and Kelley RI and Stalenhoef AF and Drenth JP}, journal={Clin Pharmacol Ther}, volume={75}, number={5}, pages={476-83}}

results.title: Hyperimmunoglobulinemia D and periodic fever syndrome; treatment with etanercept and follow-up.
results.text_hl: The @DISEASE_Mevalonate_Kinase_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D054078 @@@hyperimmunoglobulinemia D@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Autoinflammatory_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056660 @@@periodic fever syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Mevalonate_Kinase_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D054078 @@@HIDS@@@) is an @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Autoinflammatory_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056660 @@@autoinflammatory syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Topaloğlu R, Ayaz NA, Waterham HR, Yüce A, Gumruk F, Sanal O. Hyperimmunoglobulinemia D and periodic fever syndrome; treatment with etanercept and follow-up. Clin Rheumatol. 2008 Oct;27(10):1317-20. PMID: 18506569
citations.BibTeX: @article{18506569, title={Hyperimmunoglobulinemia D and periodic fever syndrome; treatment with etanercept and follow-up.}, author={Topaloğlu R and Ayaz NA and Waterham HR and Yüce A and Gumruk F and Sanal O}, journal={Clin Rheumatol}, volume={27}, number={10}, pages={1317-20}}

results.title: Manipulation of isoprenoid biosynthesis as a possible therapeutic option in mevalonate kinase deficiency.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: In cells from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with the @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Autoinflammatory_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056660 @@@autoinflammatory disorder@@@ @DISEASE_Mevalonate_Kinase_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D054078 @@@mevalonate kinase (MK) deficiency@@@, which includes the @DISEASE_Job_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D007589 @@@hyperimmunoglobulin D@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Autoinflammatory_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056660 @@@periodic fever syndrome@@@, MK becomes the rate-limiting enzyme in the @CHEMICAL_Terpenes @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013729 @@@isoprenoid@@@ biosynthesis pathway.

citations.NLM: Schneiders MS, Houten SM, Turkenburg M, Wanders RJ, Waterham HR. Manipulation of isoprenoid biosynthesis as a possible therapeutic option in mevalonate kinase deficiency. Arthritis Rheum. 2006 Jul;54(7):2306-13. PMID: 16802371
citations.BibTeX: @article{16802371, title={Manipulation of isoprenoid biosynthesis as a possible therapeutic option in mevalonate kinase deficiency.}, author={Schneiders MS and Houten SM and Turkenburg M and Wanders RJ and Waterham HR}, journal={Arthritis Rheum}, volume={54}, number={7}, pages={2306-13}}
